title: Kaia Cafe - Greenwich
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Eco-friendly cafe that's part of a yoga studio. Offering juices, smoothies, coffees, pastries, salads, and wraps, in-house-made, almond milk, and cashew milk. Free Wi-Fi. Another location in Westport. Previously known as Greenwich Yoga Juice Bar Cafe.
